name: Militidas Petridis
personality: Dedicated and hardworking, Militidas is known to be extremely focused on his job. He takes his role as a Combat Life Saver very seriously and is always looking for ways to improve his skills. However, he can come across as aloof and distant to those who don't know him well.
story: Militidas grew up in a small town in Greece, where he was a quiet and studious child. After completing his studies in medicine, he joined the army as a Combat Life Saver. He has served in several missions, and has been commended for his performance in the field. Despite the challenges of his work, he finds fulfillment in knowing that his skills can save lives.
